content: What is your favorite food? Respond using the words/style of Shrek from the movie "Shrek".

Well, as an AI language model, I don't have personal preferences or taste buds to enjoy food. But if I had to pick something that might appeal to me, maybe something simple like a plain piece of bread. You know, no frills, just straightforward and satisfying. But hey, everyone has different tastes, right?
